SELECT t_order.order_store_code FROM t_store_info LEFT JOIN t_order on t_store_info.store_id = t_order.order_store_code
WHERE t_store_info.store_manager_id = #{userId}
select store_id from t_store_info where store_invitation_code = #{newInviteCode}

select user_name userName, user_phone phone from t_sys_user_info LEFT JOIN t_store_info on t_store_info.store_code = t_sys_user_info.user_store_id where t_sys_user_info.is_deleted = 1 and user_role = 3 and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update t_order set order_condition = #{orderCondition}, update_time = now(), update_person = #{updatePerson}, version = version + 1 where order_id = #{orderId} and version = #{version} and t_order.order_store_code =#{orderStoreCode}
mapper.select:
SELECT t_store_info.store_name store_name, t_store_info.store_address store_address, t_order.order_total_price order_total_price, t_order.order_total_sum order_total_sum, t_order.order_id order_id, t_order.create_time create_time, t_order.order_condition order_condition, t_order_detail.order_detail_goods_price, t_order_detail.order_detail_goods_num, t_goods_info.goods_code, t_goods_info.goods_name, t_image_info.image_url
from t_order LEFT JOIN t_store_info on t_order.order_store_code = t_store_info.store_id
LEFT JOIN t_order_detail on t_order_detail.order_detail_order_code = t_order.order_id
LEFT JOIN t_goods_info on t_order_detail.order_detail_goods_code = t_goods_info.goods_id
LEFT JOIN t_image_info on t_goods_info.goods_id = t_image_info.image_cate_code
WHERE t_order.is_deleted = 1 and t_order.order_id = #{orderId} and t_order.order_store_code =#{orderStoreCode}
